database.name: VIEW EHCM_DECISION_SUBTYPE_V
database.view: SELECT absence.ehcm_absence_type_id AS ehcm_decision_subtype_v_id, absence.ad_client_id, absence.ad_org_id, absence.isactive, absence.created, absence.createdby, absence.updated, absence.updatedby, absence.value, absence.name, 'AB' AS type FROM ehcm_absence_type absence UNION ALL SELECT scholarship.ehcm_deflookups_typeln_id AS ehcm_decision_subtype_v_id, scholarship.ad_client_id, scholarship.ad_org_id, scholarship.isactive, scholarship.created, scholarship.createdby, scholarship.updated, scholarship.updatedby, scholarship.value, scholarship.name, 'SCTR' AS type FROM ehcm_deflookups_typeln scholarship JOIN ehcm_deflookups_type type ON type.ehcm_deflookups_type_id = scholarship.ehcm_deflookups_type_id WHERE type.reference = 'SC' UNION ALL SELECT busmission.ehcm_mission_category_id AS ehcm_decision_subtype_v_id, busmission.ad_client_id, busmission.ad_org_id, busmission.isactive, busmission.created, busmission.createdby, busmission.updated, busmission.updatedby, '' AS value, busmission.name, 'BUMS' AS type FROM ehcm_mission_category busmission UNION ALL SELECT overtime.ehcm_overtime_type_id AS ehcm_decision_subtype_v_id, overtime.ad_client_id, overtime.ad_org_id, overtime.isactive, overtime.created, overtime.createdby, overtime.updated, overtime.updatedby, '' AS value, overtime.overtype_name AS name, 'OT' AS type FROM ehcm_overtime_type overtime UNION ALL SELECT suspension.ad_ref_list_id AS ehcm_decision_subtype_v_id, suspension.ad_client_id, suspension.ad_org_id, suspension.isactive, suspension.created, suspension.createdby, suspension.updated, suspension.updatedby, suspension.value, suspension.name, 'SUS' AS type FROM ad_ref_list suspension WHERE suspension.ad_reference_id = '1DF68D671A694A7DA14EB8A157BFFF66' UNION ALL SELECT delegation.ad_ref_list_id AS ehcm_decision_subtype_v_id, delegation.ad_client_id, delegation.ad_org_id, delegation.isactive, delegation.created, delegation.createdby, delegation.updated, delegation.updatedby, delegation.value, delegation.name, 'DEL' AS type FROM ad_ref_list delegation WHERE delegation.ad_reference_id = 'EEA13D2953444F3B86A42420720F2103' UNION ALL SELECT termination.ehcm_termination_reason_id AS ehcm_decision_subtype_v_id, termination.ad_client_id, termination.ad_org_id, termination.isactive, termination.created, termination.createdby, termination.updated, termination.updatedby, termination.value, termination.name, 'TER' AS type FROM ehcm_termination_reason termination UNION ALL SELECT disciplinary.ehcm_deflookups_typeln_id AS ehcm_decision_subtype_v_id, disciplinary.ad_client_id, disciplinary.ad_org_id, disciplinary.isactive, disciplinary.created, disciplinary.createdby, disciplinary.updated, disciplinary.updatedby, disciplinary.value, disciplinary.name, 'DIS' AS type FROM ehcm_deflookups_typeln disciplinary JOIN ehcm_deflookups_type type ON type.ehcm_deflookups_type_id = disciplinary.ehcm_deflookups_type_id WHERE type.reference = 'DR'
